title: Thoughts on Jax!

embed.description: WANNA GET FREELO? WANNA GET B*TCHES? Play hybrid Jax! ►FREE TRIAL! Lower ping with WTFast: http://bit.ly/WTFRESCO ►More epic nice vidyas? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IHIVP60rspM&list=UUkOZw6Eyzt9rK8zR5d9MEvw Subscribe here ►http://bit.ly/Brofresco STALK ME! body: Firstly i would like to say that i am not trying to start a fight/arguement. I have created this board to share my thoughts on the new meta: Hybrid Jax. Most of you would have probably come across a jax that builds hybrid; {{item:3124}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3078}} . Well if you have, then you know that it has to be nerfed. I was playing today and came across a hybrid jax. I remembered from Brofresco's vid (shout out to the brofrescini) that hybrid jax DESTROYS. Well.... in just 8mins into the game, jax could 1v2 ( i was playing katarina). Then in 30mins, jax could 1v4. The damage that jax dealt was CRAZY. It took him 3 AUTO-ATTACKS to kill our zed, and the same for me. So if any people from riot happen to read my board, please take into account what Brofresco and i have said. ;) Thanks!{{champion:24}}  Oh and as you can see on the thumbnail of brofrescos video, one hit did half hp to the enemy champion.

replies.body: Why does anyone watch this kid? He's like the Pewdiepie of LoL. He just makes derpy vids for 12 year old kids and then takes twitter pics of him and his "hot" gf "flexn" on the h8rs :^)
Yea, and people say hes "only a Bronze ban".....OP asf
if you don't like brofresco go away no need to say shit
As a jax main I say NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

You died to Jax as Kat when it is very easy to shunpo away everytime he jumps on you... even if jax is on the strong side right now it hr isnt on the stage where you need to ban every game he is just a ok ban if other people like mundo are banned.

"Jax is 21/7 and killing me please nerf"

We should nerf kat cause you were 23/6 and did more damage then the jax.
